body:
DECLARE @code NVARCHAR(50)='$CURSOR$', @id int
SELECT @id=id FROM STG_FRT_MDM.dbo.Product WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE code=@code
INSERT INTO dbo.Product
(
    ExtraProperties,
    ConcurrencyStamp,
    CreationTime,
    CreatorId,
    LastModificationTime,
    LastModifierId,
    IsDeleted,
    DeleterId,
    DeletionTime,
    Code,
    Name,
    WebName,
    Description,
    ShortName,
    IsHotItem,
    IsRarelyItem,
    IsActive,
    CountRareItem,
    Priority,
    Status,
    BasePrice,
    Remark,
    IsDisplayUICode,
    IsDisplayUIName,
    IsPrivateLabel,
    IsPublished,
    ReasonCancel,
    CreatedBy,
    UpdatedBy,
    DeletedBy,
    IsAsyncedToPos,
    Slug,
    HeadingText,
    DescriptionShort,
    IsHiddenWeb
)
SELECT ExtraProperties,
    ConcurrencyStamp,
    CreationTime,
    CreatorId,
    LastModificationTime,
    LastModifierId,
    IsDeleted,
    DeleterId,
    DeletionTime,
    Code,
    Name,
    WebName,
    Description,
    ShortName,
    IsHotItem,
    IsRarelyItem,
    IsActive,
    CountRareItem,
    Priority,
    Status,
    BasePrice,
    Remark,
    IsDisplayUICode,
    IsDisplayUIName,
    IsPrivateLabel,
    IsPublished,
    ReasonCancel,
    CreatedBy,
    UpdatedBy,
    DeletedBy,
    IsAsyncedToPos,
    Slug,
    HeadingText,
    DescriptionShort,
    IsHiddenWeb FROM STG_FRT_MDM.dbo.Product WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE id=@id
INSERT INTO dbo.ProductCategory
(
    ProductId,
    CategoryId,
    CreationTime,
    LastModificationTime,
    IsPrimaryCategory
)
SELECT  ProductId,
    CategoryId,
    CreationTime,
    LastModificationTime,
    IsPrimaryCategory FROM STG_FRT_MDM.dbo.ProductCategory WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ProductId=@id
INSERT INTO dbo.ProductAttributeValue
(
    ProductId,
    AttributeId,
    CustomValue,
    AttributeOptionId,
    IsShownUI,
    DisplayOrder,
    ProductVariantId
)SELECT ProductId,
    AttributeId,
    CustomValue,
    AttributeOptionId,
    IsShownUI,
    DisplayOrder,
    ProductVariantId FROM STG_FRT_MDM.dbo.ProductAttributeValue WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ProductId=@id
